author: {'steamid': '76561198043782587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 598, 'playtime_forever': 6039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5601, 'last_played': 1590018001}
review:
Serious Sam is a series of a games that were developed by Croteam and is a old-school no-nonsense FPS. Just kidding about old-school, it's more of a arcade-ish horde fighting game, more focused on shooting down tons of enemies rather than exploring mazes, all while Quake 1 was struggling to have more than few enemies on a screen. But hey, when there was so many military shooters, you couldn't be picky.

Anyway, The First Encounter was released in 2001, becoming a sleeper hit at the time when other developers were starting to compete at making the most boring realistical games already. You would be playing as Serious Sam, going back into past because unknown alien by name Mental was attacking Earth and even still manages to send his colorful troops into the past as well to stop you. And thus Sam Stone had to get serious, shoot many things, grab many weapons and beat many Egypt levels, filled with huge spaces and handled as one continous arena. And reading excuse text that Netricsa, your mind computer, was sending you. It also had small moments of silence, mystery and spookyness, rarely.

The Second Encounter was a sort of sequel or stand-alone expansion pack, that came out in 2002. Thanks to Croteam, Sam is still on Earth and now has to travel over 12 more levels, with 5 in Maya era, 4 in Persia or so and 3 in Gothic. Though they felt less interesting, aside from the last three levels of Gothic that are simply awesome. Plus new weapons, like sniper rifle that is used as single-shot super double shotgun rather than for sniping (but it's strong only when aiming down sight. Right mouse click, left mouse click, done!). And new enemies. And new bosses. And music is still awesome.
It also came with fan-made mod Warped that gave Serious Sam more multiplayer competive modes like capture the flag.

Didn't take long for Gold edition to come out, that was a simple compilation of the two games, but  Second Encounter now had more exclusive deathmatch levels and a fan-made single-player mappack The Dark Island. It's amateurish and seemed to be comissioned with tight deadlines, so eh. Buggy too.

Few years later these games would be remade in HD, but you know, it's a different story, with some cuttin and rebalancing.
Another version to note is Xbox version of Serious Sam, that combined both games while giving it changes in style to make it fit more toward more cartoonish Serious Sam 2. What it means is shiny different weapon models and new humorous cutscenes.

But then in 2014 a group of fans Alligator Pit got official support from Devolver Digital and Croteam and released a definite version of Serious Sam 1 games. Or more like, remastered, if that word fits. Revolution combines both Serious Sam Encounters into single game and fixes various bugs, like multiplayer being dead due to death of Gamespy or level editor not working for 64-bit systems, also giving widescreen support. Though original Classic versions on Steam would later get multiplayer and editor patched. At least Revolution allows you to download mods from multiplayer server. And yes, it got multiplayer maps from Gold edition. No, Dark Island is not included, search Steam workshop for it. Yep, Steam features implented!
But Revolution does much more. It's supposed to include a new campaign called Bright Island (no, not sequel to Dark Island) once it comes out of Early Access. As of now, it has a new Survival mode with few maps already. They even sneaked in new three weapons (not exactly new, right) into Serious Sam campaigns into three new secrets, so you can search those. Otherwise, purist be happy.

And a nice thing is that it was given free to owners of both Classic Sam titles. As a upgrade. And you also get Classic titles as a bonus if you buy this now.

Multiplayer works but isn't all that active. But it should boom a bit at least once when final version will come out.
Though it's mostly to hang out with friends. Competive has two interesting rules: super speed when holding knife and double shotgun shoots as fast as single shotgun. It gives more fun, but still doesn't balance perfectly. Still, shame it didn't make competetive scene, it doesn't weight you down with silly strafejumping while being extremely fast-paced.
Coop should be fun too. Mhmm, even though few years in Classic Second Encountered whenever I would play on those infinite ammo servers, I felt that my brain shrank to the size of a nut. Because respawn plus infinite ammo equals to just holding left mouse button with no care for the world.

From technical side it seemed to be fine, but I noticed that weirdly enough I sometimes miss monsters a bit when turning around or side-stepping or both. It feels like shots sometimes went where my aim was at a half-second ago. Or something to do with timing. I don't remember it happening in the past in originals. But at least it's not big issue, just sometimes.

And most importanly is the same awesome gameplay. You may think that because it's a horde shooter then it must be dumb. You are destroying few hundrets monsters per level after all. You may remember one of those other trashy horde games, like where you could just beat game by backpedalling in circle while shooting away at monsters that barely catch up. Is Serious Sam as silly as that?

No. Actually, it's probably the best horde shooters out there. Because this game has a flow in combat. It makes you care about weapon selection and respect each enemy type. You may be overwhelmed by HOW much of weapons you are given by the end. But while they are generic, each of them has that one specialization where they are the best choice. Even weaker enemies can be prefered over stronger, like you will use Thompson on medium enemy encounters over Minigun if you don't want to waste bullets. Even Single Shotgun is sometimes prefered over Double Shotgun, when dealing with bunch of weak enemies. Though, it doesn't stop weapons from being divided into tiers. Sure think Plasmagun is the way to go. But you know, ammo. Ammo ammo ammo. If you want to converse ammo for big guns for big encounters, try to use weaker weapons on weaker fights. Such stuff. In other words, it makes players switch weapons instead of sticking with few "toys".

And as said, enemy diversity. They all have different tactics, all require different ways to avoid their attacks. Sure, it got one type, Gnaar, that is just weak slow melee monster. But then it got stuff like Lava Golem who aims at where you will be with fireballs and you have to either change direction or knock balls off with shots. Or skeleton Kleer, who is weak-medium healthed, but is extremely fast and attacks by leaping, so you have to sidestep this one. And when in horde, you now have to prioritise target, whether you want to shoot down weak yet explosive kamikazes, who go "Aaaaaaaaa!!", first or if you should neutralize huge chicken-like biomechanoid who is going to blow you up with rocket if he gets close and is tough on health.

A bit of planning separates good action from dumb action. Like good platformers. And good graphics for it's time with excellent art style, which is colorful yet not too cartoonish. And excellent music that is both atmospheric and memoriable and blood-bumping.
And fun secrets. Occasionally funny.

The only flaw is that it can overstay the welcome. Can get repetitive. Or at least I didn't dig some levels, especially in Second Encounter. No, final levels were awesome. It just can get old to beat it in one sitting.

But grab it, Seriously! It's a good game that I was fan of. Well, because of level editor mostly. And not only it's a good game, but it's the best pure version. As in, not remake, just definition and addition, while you can get same experience. I mean, those old-school low-poly chunks of gibs that slide all over walls have their own charm too, you know.

review: Однако очень хороший апдейт нашего старого доброго Сэма. Я поиграл немного ( но мне хватило того ощущения ностальгии когда я играл в старые части 2001 и 2004 года( если я не ошибаюсь). Интерфейс дисплея меня порадовал, иконки брони, здоровья, очков - очень даже красочно смотрятся.Графика конечно улучшена, естественно не как в HD ремейке, но вполне годно, играть можно для новых ощущений. Мне конечно может показалось - но сложность противников( я про сингл) увеличился немного...насчёт мультиплеера сказать не могу, так как не особо люблю в данных играх дэзматчи, очень люблю кооп, так что в будущем надеюсь найти людей которые смогут со мной поиграть в этом апдейте и помесить гнааров, клиров и так далее( если такие есть, пишите мне в ЛС :З) .А так апдейт очень годный, хоть даже и в раннем доступе.Будем надеяться что разрабы замутят что то ещё эдакое чтобы нас удивить) 500 миниганов из 500 :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198107663397', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7354, 'last_played': 1703062935}
review:
Апдейт зачетный (а особенно зачетный добавленный survival-режим). Но вот по сравнению с классическими версиями тут все продвинуто так круто, что даже немного ужасно - мне пришлось полчаса лазить по настройкам графики, чтобы устранить причину адских лагов (спс разрабы за гибкий "advanced rendering options").

А в целом, все традиционно - орущие камикадзе, спидраны с рокет-джампом, бензопила "дружба" и зaдроты, которые вынесут вас в deathmatch'e с пушки из любой точки карты.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044849755', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 2886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2153, 'last_played': 1630868943}
review:
Awesome! Just awesome! This game contains both Serious Sam 1 Encounters and has extra stuff. Mutators to make the game more fun, workshop to add some awesome contents, custom maps and game mods, new weapons and enemies, everything to make you want to play Serious Sam all over again! No matter when you want to play, there's always servers for you to join! If you're a Serious Sam fan, I really Recommend you get this game.

PS: By purchasing this, I also got the Serious Sam The First and Second Encounter for free.

review: Ну что сказать. Игра сама по себе довольно интерессная, но сюжет если честно скучноватый. Потому что на протяжении всей игры тупо убивать монстров. А если по сети играть то довольно весело. Игра уже старая и на те года это просто шедевр.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125331031', 'num_games_owned': 739, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 3203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3096, 'last_played': 1692404398}
review:
Uwielbiam serię Serious Sam a w szczególności jego pierwowzór nieważne czy w klasycznej bądź zremasterowanej wersji. Lecz, to co przygotowało Aligator Pit woła o pomstę do nieba gdyż tak skopanego portu nigdy nie widziałem. Zaczynając od początku.. "Revolution" jest reedycją klasycznej pierwszej części przygód Poważnego Sama w której skład wchodzi Pierwsze oraz Drugie Starcie które zostały złączone razem a na deser dostarczono nam kompletnie nowy Epizod zwany "Bright Island" na którego musieliśmy trochę poczekać. 

No więc.. co poszło nie tak? Stan Techniczny tej gry to katastrofa i wstyd dla kogokolwiek z Croteamu iż mieli czelność zatwierdzić tak skopany tytuł. Zacznijmy od tego, że wszelkie problemy oryginału nie zostały tutaj jakkolwiek naprawione czyli dalej mamy słaby pathfinding gdzie wiele wrogów można w łatwy sposób ogłupić, zwłoki dalej przejmują nasze pociski co cholernie pokrzyżuje nam życie miejscami (oraz możemy się nawet o nie blokować). Gra wielokrotnie uwielbia się wieszać a w pewnym momencie nawet u mnie oszalała.. czyli utykałem w czarnym ekranie, okienko z tytułem się minimalizowało po każdym wczytaniu stanu gry a nawet moje klatki zaczynały spadać głównie w nowej kampanii. Czasem, miałem dziwny błąd w którym kamera potrafiła świrować i dziwnie się "obracała" gdy zostałem zaatakowany przez jakiegoś pobliskiego Kleera. Na koniec, gadaniu o wielu błędach technicznych tego skopanego portu, zostawmy sobie.. Netcode..! a raczej o jego braku. Ten produkt, nie jest ani trochę nastawiony pod rozgrywkę sieciową co jasno udowadnia czemu nikt w to nie gra. Głównym problemem jest synchronizacja, często zdarza się że ty i twój znajomy będziecie mieli cokolwiek innego na ekranie (czyli np. ja walczyłbym w kompletnie innym miejscu z hordą wrogów a twój znajomy widziałby cie jak strzelasz w nic lub utykał w ścianie) co dyskwalifikuje sens grania po sieci. Deathmatch, jeszcze dawał radę.. ale co-op ani trochę.

Ale! Nie wszystko jest tutaj tak złe, jak mogło się wydawać. Wreszcie zostały ogarnięte popsute spawnery w TFE i TSE oraz pewien dość notoryczny bug który był wynikiem błędu w kodzie powodujący spowolnienie niektórych broni. Mamy również prosty dostęp do modów dzięki Steam Workshop.. i to są jedyne plusy jakie mogę wymienić. Na dodatek, zostały wplecione w Pierwsze oraz Drugie Starcie - trzy nowe bronie. Wyciętą broń "Ghostbuster" zapożyczająca amunicję z Lasera.. jest całkiem słaba oraz popsuta gdyż ma skopane hitboxy i nie ma szans że z tym cokolwiek ubijesz. Można go zdobyć w Alley of the Sphinxes z TFE. Oraz dwie bronie z moda "Seriously Warped Deathmatch" czyli Plasmathrower.. nawet okej, można znależć w The Citadel z TSE.. oraz Minelayer najbardziej bezużyteczny szajs który prędzej zabije ciebie niż ty wroga. Można go znaleźć w Land of the Damned z TSE.

Postanowiono również uraczyć nas nowym poziomem trudności i poza Mentalem który był z nami od początku dodano "I Am Ugh Zan" za ukończenie gry na Seriousie. Cóż, na moment pisania tej recenzji skończyłem TFE i myślę że mogę nieco pogadać o tym. Co on dodaje? Jest to zmodyfikowany Serious lecz ze zwiększonym zdrowiem dla każdego wroga oraz dodając nową mechanikę w postaci buffów. Otóż, liczni przeciwnicy mają szansę zrespić się z elementalem lodu bądź ognia. To pierwsze, spowalnia cię a drugie.. możecie się domyślić. Warto trzymać się na baczności oraz uzbroić w cierpliwość gdyż mamy do czynienia z nie do końca zbalansowanym stopniem trudności! Przez większość czasu, nie miałem problemu oraz "utknięcie" w jakieś sekwencji było dla mnie niemożliwe.. poza tą sekwencją z biomechanoidami w "The Great Pyramid" gdzie jedynym sensownym rozwiązaniem było kampienie jak leszcz. Tyczy to się również paru innych sekwencji jak chociażby horda kleerów z Oasis gdzie przy limitowanym uzbrojeniu.. rozprawienie się z nimi bywa ciężkie. Ale, jednak jak powiedziałem szło mi całkiem dobrze, choć nie widzi mi się granie na tym poziomie trudności drugi raz bo jest zwyczajnie monotonny i sztucznie utrudniony. 

Jeżeli chodzi o Bright Island, jeszcze tego "cudeńka" nie skończyłem więc nie mam zdania.. choć opinie w sieci bywają całkiem bolesne. Dochodząc do mojej ostatecznej konkluzji "klasyczne rewolucje" jest skopanym technicznie portem, którego nie warto tykać jeżeli planujesz rozgrywkę w co-opie, lub masz mało szczęścia. Jedyną prawdziwą zaletą tego wszystkiego, jest to że przynajmniej dostaniesz oryginały.. które już lepiej jest ogarnąć (bo to dobre gry).. a w tym? Nadziei prawdopodobnie już brak, bo jak to wiele reedycji w serii postanowiono opuścić ten projekt i zostawić go zepsutym jaki jest po dziś.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058666789', 'num_games_owned': 2128, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1570624143}
review:
Весьма меня радовал Serious Sam я даже был фанатом этой игры хоть меня смотрит толпа задротов но это уж не важно так мне пришлось играть в эту игру зашол в сетевуху а там пинг высокий (Инет норм но плохо работает но это не важно :D).
Это ремейк сделаный на первом движке Serious хоть графика как класика только можно играть бесконечно и ещё новая часть который не вышла ждать придеться долго но играть с другом весело чем с одиночкой (Хотя если не инета) можно похвалить разрабов за такой шедевр. Если вы играли в Serious Sam ещё на пиратке то советую купить за скидку а то она сейчас стоит за 150 рублей но это не беда как понять по моей олдфаговской голове я эту игру вспомнил и буду вспоминать всегда

author: {'steamid': '76561198125266664', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 386, 'last_played': 1498941769}
review:
Старый, добрый Сем...
Как много слез я пролил, когда в очередной раз запустил этот Шедевр!
Я был еще маленькой личнкой, когда в 1 раз поиграл в Серьезный Сем: Первое Пришествие...
И запомнилась мне эта игра на все время, думаю, что и на жизнь хватит.
А во Второе Пришествие я поиграл позже, но сказать, что игра что то потеряла для меня за это время - не могу...
Что ждет тебя в этом паке?
1.Первое и Второе пришествия.
2.Серьезный Сем: Революция. (Ребята немного подкачали граффику и уместили 2 игры в 1.)
3.Мультиплеер.(Бой на смерть и Совместное прохождение компании)
Плюсы:
+Ты прольешь слезу от чувства настольгии..
+Мать вашу, это же Сем!
Минусы?
-Серьезно? Их нет!
Общее:
Игра не дорогая, да и на скидке я приобрел ее за 17р
Если ты не знаком с первыми сериями этой игры, то советую от сердца.
Не в коем случае не начинай знакомство с Серьезного Сема 3!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198016713100', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 2609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1337, 'last_played': 1561579843}
review:
First and Second Encounter for a very low price. 

Not only that, you get access to the workshop for custom maps. 

Not only that, you MIGHT get a 3rd SS campaign (it is currently greyed out when selecting between 1st and 2nd encounter but they said that campaign is coming)

Just buy the thing already. One of the best, if not the best price/content*quality ratio on Steam. 

Multiplayer works perfectly, might be troublesome to find random people to play but if lots of people buy it... Played on a server from very far away at 400 ping (it was me, others had around 20-50) and it worked surprisingly well for 400 ping.

Actual review if you never played Serious Sam? Fast paced old-school arena based FPS with lots of weapons and enemies. Lots of difficulty options from a stroll to crying blood. Huge ammount of secrets everywhere with good humor in some of them. Inspired and varried level design with 4 settings: Ancient Egypt, Mayan ruins, Persian Empire and medieval.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028193995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 1158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 992, 'last_played': 1507855654}
review:
If you have Serious Sam HD then why would you want to get this? A couple of reasons.

There is a promise for a cool looking campaign called Bright Island (not Dark Island).

Split Screen with TFE and TSE is available in this game where in HD it is not.

Serious Sam Classic had gravity effects in some areas. Not a big deal but you can say: "Ha I can do this here and not there."

Workshop has some good maps, some of which are ported from Classic versions.

Finally you can get it for free if you get the Gold edition of Serious Sam HD.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033220385', 'num_games_owned': 691, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1572636712}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020705409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 1148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1129, 'last_played': 1438460357}
review:
Recopilación de los dos primeros episodios de ésta saga, realizada por fans y que añade modos extra de juego, una nueva campaña (aún sin finalizar), leves mejoras gráficas y compatibilidad con Steam Workshop.
Acción directa y descerebrada en amplios mapas, donde te enfrentaras a cientos de enemigos y a jefes enormes con la ayuda de un gran y variado arsenal.
Si en su día no jugaste a The First y The Second Encounter, ahora tienes una buena oportunidad. Si, por el contrario, ya los tienes, aquí no encontrarás nada realmente importante para volver a pagar, al menos, hasta que esté completo y salga de Early Access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073361424', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1312, 'last_played': 1438557080}
review:
Serious Sam Classics: Revolution is a game about a man named Sam Stone being sent back in time to try to stop an alien invasion from occurring in the future. However, as he progresses he realized more and more the futility of his quest. Along his journey he witnesses the horrors that make up the malevolent forces' armies, including genetic experiments, enslaved alien races,  and brutal human corpses stitched back together and used as a grunt force.

This game is not for the faint of heart. It is extremely serious in tone and truly hammers in the ultimate pointlessness of attempting to face an army that is simply too large in size to contend with. No matter how strong Sam is, no matter what he is capable of, eventually he will fall, and the aliens will arise victorious in their domination of all humanity.

Most serious game ever made. 10/10-wait a sec...

OH SHIT IT'S A CANNON THAT SHOOTS CANNONBALLS AND THEN THE CANNONBALLS EXPLODE

author: {'steamid': '76561198060401173', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9860, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9317, 'last_played': 1582911250}

author: {'steamid': '76561198131644279', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 7710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2229, 'last_played': 1687792088}
review:
Игра мне понравилась как и первые Сэмы, дешевле и круче.

Плюсы:

- Новые 3 пушки, миномет, плазмомет, и GHOSTBUSTER (миномет нельзя получить в кампании)
- Новые враги (Нельзя увидеть в кампании)
- Новый HUD, который можна сменить.
- Наконец-то добавили Workshop в игру, так что после компании, смело качайте другие карты!
- Геймплей как и в First и Second Encounter , просто великолепен.
- Теперь в Revolution есть выживание. Это круто!
- Графон по идее подкачали, хотя не заметил разницы.
- Дешевая цена, чем у Классических Сэмов.
- Есть мультитатор (удваивание патроннов, скорость выстрела, и монстров) и за этого просто бешенно весело играть, Devil Mod идет в сраку!

Минусы:
- Есть баги, вылеты, и за чего невозможно играть в коопе.
- В Кооп фиг поиграешь, всегда есть проблемы с интернетом.

И за этих минусов кооп уйдет в могилу.



Итог: Дешевая перезагрузка которая достойна быть в вашем библиотеке игр, с мяском, неплохим коопом, и безумным геймплеем, Serious Sam - лучшая серия игр на сегодня.

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198193954298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1085, 'last_played': 1482348928}
review: Прошло полтора года, и наконец-то долгожданный Serious Sam: Revolution перед нами. Выглядит ли он помолодевшим классическим Сэмом, или же перед нами нелепо выглядящий и едва ковыляющий после пластической операции старичок ? Справедливости ради надо сказать, что Revolution попал в открытый доступ намного раньше, чем это планировалось изначально, так что разработчки открыто намекают и предупреждают о недоработках. Что ж, давайте-ка сами взглянем, что тут получилось !

author: {'steamid': '76561198117110667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1486, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1593182888}
review: Good old shoot em up horde style FPS. If you were an FPSer back in the early 2000's, you would know about Serious Sam. Started as a tech demo and soon blew up into it's own series, Serious Sam chronicles the story of Sam "Serious" Stone as he fights the other worldly foe known as "Mental". He goes back in time to fight his way through hordes of Mental's minions to save planet earth's future from total destruction. You pick up an arsenal of sweet and GIANT weapons and fight your way through various periods in earth's history to save planet earth from Mental's grasp. This version of Serious Sam is titled "Revolution" and packs both encounter's plus workshop support and also promises new episodes and loads of new maps made by players and the revival team. So, never heard of it? Love Mindless killing? Played it a million times? Buy it. Now.

review: Having played all the Serious Sam games (spin-offs included) I must say that this has to be the best game in the series. author: {'steamid': '76561198123271555', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1692510495}
review:
Serious Sam Classics: [strike]Revolution[/strike] Jews-именно так можно назвать эту игру. Нет серьезно вместо одной игры вы получаете целую кучу+допиленный мультиплеер+кучу новых плюшек. Ценинителей этого жанра осталось совсем мало-это действительно классика. А по хардости в некоторых местах она превзойдет эти ваши Дарк Соулсы в несколько раз. И кстати в этом казалось бы тупом мясце есть классный сюжет, раскрывающий личность главного героя.  [strike]Хотя кому это нужно?[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198056461121', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1459641040}
review:
PEAZO DE JUEGO SEÑORES Y SEÑORAS.
Es un shooter en el que todo es a lo grande, armas cada vez mas destructivas, bichos cada vez mas raros. Se dispara desde la cadera, pero tenemos un punto que nos guia, como el QUAKE. Mapas largos y con buenos puntos de salvados, para si te matan no tener que repetir todo el capitulo. La dificultad muy buena y progresiva, en ningun momento te desquicia y quieres dejar el juego.
En el 2 el coop online funciona, aqui no lo he probado, pero lo recomiendo 100 %.
Apesar del tiempo que tiene, esta version esta muy lograda en cuanto a graficos y optimizada. Yo juego con un i7 y una gtx 660 y me va muy bien, ni despacio ni a toda castaña.
Le pongo un 9/10 para que no se relajen en el 4, xD

author: {'steamid': '76561198045798763', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1488700466}
review:
Serious Sam is a classic game. It's not arguable. This game just made it a whole lot more kickass.
In the mid 2000's, I remember playing this on a burned CD on our very bad computer and having a blast on the first level.
Last night, almost 10 years later, for $2.00 me and my friend pulled the best all nighter in history. Serious Sam holds a test of time. Not only for being a 14 year game and looking like a game that came out 6 or 7 years ago, but the fluid FPS action is something we just don't see anymore. In the early FPS such as DOOM, Duke Nukem, and Serious Sam, we see this fluid gameplay at runs at 60 always and has a perfect balance of insanity and fun. Not to mention this game has some of the best box art ever, and we're smooth sailing.

Pros.
+Amazing Gameplay
+Gory
+Good weapon choices
+CO-OP! FINALLY
+Deathmatch, feels a bit like Quake Live, but we have it.
+Survival.

Cons
- Almost no story unless you read into it
- Dated
- Not many online games

Gameplay: 9/10. Best fast paced game I've played in a while
Graphics: 6/10. Dated, but if you get the HD version, they look good.

Overall 8/10. I have to warn you though, if graphics are a niche for you, do not get this version. You won't have co-op or deathmatch and an added bonus of online survival, but the graphics are far more improved. Overall, this is a steal, getting 2 good games for the price of one. The devs really knocked it out of the park.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974358126', 'num_games_owned': 922, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1578173159}

review:
This game includes TWO classic FPS games. Serious Sam is like if Doom guy and Duke Nukem created the ultimate heir to their legacy, including the viceral gameplay and unique setting.

Serious Sam Classics: Revolution takes the original games and amplifies it with tons of new content, bug fixes, achievements, and fuckin' steam workshop mods. If you're looking for a deal, this is the one you should get. I'd highly recommend this to anyone who grew up with these games. 

They may not be the HD remakes, but it doesn't really matter when you can practically make it HD with the OpenGL options.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115815134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 711, 'last_played': 1644549366}
review:
Forgot Call of Duty, this is a TRUE First Person Shooter. Real men play Serious Sam.

Every gamer who was around in the early 2000's knows of the legendary Serious Sam. The very same cheesy-action-movie-like guy who charges through hordes of Mental's abominations... using a GIANT CANNON. 
The game is pretty violent and mindless, and yet, I can't help but like Serious Sam. Now, a group of fans named Alligator Pit combined The First and Second Encounter, and plans on releasing a few new weapons, levels, and a whole new campaign. The graphics are still classic (If you want great graphics, go grab the HD versions, they look great and are easy to run.) but here you have a great game and its great sequel smashed together with survival mode, PVP modes like Deathmatch, EPIC CO-OP games that are much crazier and more insane with a bunch of friends. And, the game manages to be only 10 dollars! Did I mention workshop support!?

The only CON that I can find? The updates are kind of slow, but there is more than enough to do in this game and with Alligator Pit bringing in Bright Island, I'm sure its for the best.

So I'd get this game if I were you. I bought the SS Gold Pack on sale, and I've spent a long time playing them so far. Grab your minigun and lets get serious!

review: Тот же старый добрый Serious Sam 1, соединили SE и FE. Добавили режим выживания и пару режимов в мультиплеере. Добавлено несколько новых но бессмысленых оружий, причём некоторые из Warped-a. Как в ДМ так мне вообще не понравилось: очень косячное соединение, пинг почему то аномалит, да и движок подкорректировали, гранатомёт больше не бахает грены об стены, для них это был БАГ! И финты с прыжками на картах ДМ многие перестали работать, по-моему ДМ режим для олдфагов они тупо закопали... А базовый кооп стал лучше, хотя бы из-за ачивок.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041601161', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 8500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 825, 'last_played': 1644110347}
review:
No Kleer bones about it, Serious Sam Classics: Revolution is the definitive package from which to indulge in your Serious Sam fix sans terrible artstyle, voice acting, and modern fps conventions.

No reason not to get this for the multiplayer aspect since both previous releases of First and Second Encounter relied on GameSpy.

Still Early Access, still bugged in places (at time of writing Sacred Yards had big issues), but for the most part functional.

Bright Island not out yet.

The best improvement to the originals Alligator Pit made is UI improvements which more neatly sort ammunition layout and properly tells you when you have full ammo. 

If you like Serious Sam support this fan release and get it. Even if you hate Second Encounter like I do that's okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147490163', 'num_games_owned': 427, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 3333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1052, 'last_played': 1568069354}
review:
Serious Sam: TFE y TSE (Clásicos) en un solo juego. Pero no solo eso, está mejorado, aunque esté en Early Access. Tiene nuevos modos como la supervivencia por ejemplo, que los originales no lo tienen, nueva campaña (No está terminada todavía), tiene HUDs nuevos, entre otras cosas (Incluidos secretos nuevos, nuevas armas, etc). Totalmente recomendable. Sólo tiene dos "contras":
- No se actualiza muy seguido. Pero tengamos en cuenta que esta versión es mantenida y modificada por fans de Serious Sam, no por Croteam, así que es entendible.
- No tiene muchos servidores.

A pesar de eso, lo recomiendo totalmente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131424469', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1523711524}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011421602', 'num_games_owned': 1456, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1055, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 514, 'last_played': 1634551679}
review:
Serious Sam Classics: Revolution es un juego hecho por fans para fans de la saga serious sam ya que ofrece varias novedades 

En si podemos jugar las 2 campañas de los 2 serious sam (First encounter and Second encounter) juntas y ademas lo novedoso y lo bueno es que tiene workshop y eso es aun mejor ya que podes bajarte skins, mods, maps etc todo para ver mejor el juego y decorarlo a tu gusto con los moderinos.
Eso si el juego aun no se lanzo oficialmente esta en un early access para lo que quieren contribuir al desarrollo del juego pero si sos un fan de este juego lo recomendaria al 100% ya que es serious sam!

author: {'steamid': '76561198172569030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 354, 'last_played': 1471457672}
review:
Игра, которую не сможет заменить ни один современный шутер. Игра, которой не нужна современная графика или инновационый геймплей, чтобы запомниться навсегда. Это адреналин в чистом виде. Это бешеный темп, который просто не даст вам стоять на месте. Это толпы разношерстной нечисти, летающей и плавающей, бегающей и скачущей, вооруженной когтями или парными ракетницами. Это, в конце концов, огромный шестиствольный пулемет в ваших руках. Великая. Колоссальная. Серьезная. Игра с большой буквы, которую можно проходить вновь и вновь, десятки раз прорываясь сквозь толпу скелетов с двустволкой в руках. Ни одна игра не будет для меня лучше, чем похождения Сэма Стоуна.

P.S. И не забудьте пройти секретные уровни.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075759312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1440838032}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020004764', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1041, 'last_played': 1690725929}
review:
Этот обзор имеет довольно много слов и откровений, если у вас есть время прочитайте его.
Игра просто нереальная!!!
С братом проходили её 2 раза!!! Впервый раз пытались пройти её на сплитскрине ( деление экрана для двоих игроков) какой же это был кабздец. Я на джойстиике зашёл раньше, увидел врага, целился в него 2 минуты... И тут брат делит экран попалам и начинает тоже играть. В первую же секунду когда он дёрнул мышку прицел двинулся и у меня. В итоге, две минуты прицеливания напрасно. Прошу разрабортчиков это исправить, чтобы не было такого, что мышка управляет двумя экранми, а джойстик на геймпаде только своим. Потом адское управление на джойстике, я мог бегать только раком из-за того, что на джойстике была только кнопка назад и адская чувствительность, из-за которой любое касание джойстика напраляло прицел в небо или в землю. Брат плакал от смеха, бился башкой об стол и просил меня пересть ругаться, а я поливал матом это всё. Всё - таки решили сыграть по инету и прошли обе части. А второй раз проходи на его дне рождении втроём, и там был баг. На втором секретном уровне в первой крови [spoiler] который находится перед последним уровнем. Если после последний заворухи на уровне пойти не прямо к выходу и повернуть направо, то там его можно найти [/spoiler] . Игра жёстко залагала. У друга пинг 16000, у менф виснет и пинг 5000, а у брата, который хост, пинг 500 и он очень тяжело прошёл этот уровень. Примечание, это началось полсе того, как мы активировали секрет с пирамидой из ящиков.

И так,

Графон не плохой, для игр 1999 и 2000 года отличный 10 из 10
Сюжета нет. Но он точно там не нужен.
Геймплей миллион из 10.
Музыка - просто муражки по коже.

Всем рекомендую эту игру!!! 
PS если у вас есть первая и вторая часть классические, то тогда у вас будут стандартные скины оружий, а если только революция, то другие. 

Всем удачи, и хорошего настроения!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027883487', 'num_games_owned': 1774, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 4408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3622, 'last_played': 1628440462}
review:
Serious Sam - Это лучший Шутер в мире. Пока вы будите сидеть в Батле и Колде, я буду сидеть в Сэме...  Сэм один из лучших персонажей видео игр.
У него в руках только лучшие пушки. Бензопила, Томсон, Двустволка, Пушка SBC и конечно Миниган. И куда он их применяет? Конечно в "Орду кровожадных Инопланетян".
Сосчитайте оружия и врагов, и вы получите PROFIT.
Пистолеты + Камикадзе = PROFIT. Скелеты + Двустволка = PROFIT. 
И как же не мочить врагов без музыки Damjan Mravunac и Undercode. 
В Итоге вы получите опупуительную игру. Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040925240', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1561807453}
review:
Az a baja mint a Half-Life 2nek: szimplán rosszul öregedett.
Túl sokat játszottam vele és mostanra ha előveszem akkor olyan undor kap el, hogy az valami hihetetlen (legalábbis a First Encounterrel).
A Second Encountert még mindig imádom, de a First borzalmas a közepe tájt.

Mindezt leszámitva tetszik a Modern Hud és a Workshop Support.
Másik pedig, hogy ingyen volt mivel megvettem a Gold Editiont még anno.
.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055054505', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1165, 'last_played': 1427234526}
review:
Классика, переизданная фанатами, подкрутившими графику до более-менее приличного вида. Однако подкрутили не везде, а в игре встречаются баги, из-за которых игра может вылетать или ломаться сейвы. Сами Croteam уже выпустили куда более красивое переиздание первых двух игр, однако там игру немного перетрясли и изменили дизайн, а здесь всё как в оригинале.

Из плюсов - сразу две игры по цене всего за 150 рублей! А ведь это почти 20 часов сингл-геймплея. Игра и в 2015-м играется отлично. Один из лучших шутеров всех времен и народов. Именно поэтому раз в пару лет обязательно перепрохожу Первое и Второе пришествия.

8\10

author: {'steamid': '76561198087137405', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1509309293}
review:
Jogo muito foda, que foi ofuscado pelo péssimo marketing, portanto não tem ninguém jogando.
Mas mesmo assim vale apena.
O Single player do jogo é legal e talz, mas o bom mesmo é arrumar um amigo e jogar co-op.
No meu ponto de vista, uma das melhores coisas do jogo é a oficina steam, que permite baixar add-ons e mods.
Mesmo assim o jogo vale apena, por ser relativamente barato.
(O jogo inclui o first encounter e second encounter)

Gráfico: 6.5/10 (Pouca melhora, podiam ter deixado as texturas com uma qualidade melhor)
Jogabilidade: 10/10 (:D)
Som: 7/10
História: N/A

Nota geral: 8.5

author: {'steamid': '76561198106343740', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1424944856}
review:
THIS REVIW IS IN ENG & ITA


Usually when fans make mods or remakes of games, they have to be distributed for free to avoid the obvious copyright laws. That's not the case with Serious Sam Classics: Revolution, a fan-made project that's officially been sanctioned by series developer Croteam and is being distributed by Hotline Miami publisher Devolver Digital.

1
Croteam is offering its supervision of the project, while the fans at Alligator Pit have created an anthology comprised of Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter (2001) and The Second Encounter (2002) with updated tech and new content like added campaign levels, weapons, game modes and multiplayer maps.

Serious Sam Classics: Revolution is now available on Steam Early Access where it will usually cost £7.99. However, it will be half off during its first week on sale, while those who own the original games will be able to download this fan-made remake/anthology for free.

This is the second time a developer has not only allowed fans to remake its game, but decided to authorise its selling as a commercial product. Last year Valve gave the fan-made remake of Half-Life, Black Mesa, the go-ahead to be a commercial product on Steam, but that has yet to come to fruition - though a free version has been available for awhile. Teaming up with fans seems like a smart move on Croteam's part as it allows both the original developer and dedicated fans to make money, plus it brings a couple of over a decade old titles back into the limelight with a new coat of paint.

Take a gander at what Croteam's fans have cooked up in Serious Sam Classics: Revolution's Early Access launch trailer below.

Si chiama Serious Sam: Revolution ed è un omaggio dei fan alla folle serie fps di Croteam. Si tratta infatti di un videogioco basato sull’originale Serious Sam: The First Encounter che segnò il debutto della saga nel 2001 e The Second Ecounter pubblicato nel 2002.

Revolution è realizzato dagli appassionati sotto la supervisione dei Croteam ed aggiunge all’fps diversi contenuti.

L’engine è stato rivisto per migliorarne la qualità e sistemarne i bug oltre ad aggiungere il pieno supporto ai 64bit e una completa integrazione con Steamworks.

Già, perché Serious Sam: Revolution è disponibile in Accesso Anticipato su Steam, periodo che servirà agli autori per aggiungere nuovi contenuti, armi, modalità di gioco e livelli grazie alle opinioni della community.

Il prezzo è fissato a 4,49 euro, dimezzato rispetto a quello finale, ma sarà gratuito per tutti coloro che già possiedono i due classici su Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985557375', 'num_games_owned': 588, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 431, 'last_played': 1624502915}
review:
If you want the definite version of Serious Sam Classic (The First & Second Encounter) then this is the way to go. It has been updated to better support for modern PC/OS configurations, with improved Widescreen resolution support, with added Achievements and Workshop and various other fixes.

However, if you want the exact same games but with high definition graphics go pick up Serious Sam HD: The First & Second Encounter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053852490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1421509052}
review:
Не всім були до вподоби HD перевидання, та більшість старих прихильників серії продовжували грати оригінальні Serious Sam. Але 21.02.13 було закрито сервіс GameSpy, а з ним і десятки тисяч серверів, для сотень ігор, в тому числі і Serious Sam Classic. Саме тому фанатське комюніті створило свою версію класичного Сема, але вже з покращеною графікою, об’єднаним сюжетом First та Second Encounter, новими рінями, а саме головне зонлайном на серверах Steam. 

Оригінальний сюжет Serious Sam залишився без змін. В недалекому майбутньому, десь у Єгипті, люди знайшли артефакт древньої могутньої раси з планети Сіріус. Дослідження цього артефакту дозволило людству швидко прогресувати та освоїти космос, але разом із науковим прогресом, артефакт привів на Землю тих самих прибульців, на чолі зі злим Менталом. Як людство не намагалось перемогти у цій війні, але інопланетної нечисті було більше, і люди опинились на межі повного винищення. Саме в цей час вчені знайшли ще один артефакт "Ключ до вічності" який міг перенести одну людину, у будь яку точку, в часі та просторі. Цією людиною став Семюель Стоун, по прізвиську Крутий Сем, герой війни з інопланетянами, був відправлений в минуле, щоб знищити Ментала до прибуття на Землю. Згодом Сем на літаючій тарілці відправляється на планету Сіріус, щоб надерти зад Менталу, як раптом в нього врізається інше НЛО. Сем падає назад на Землю, і прокидається в джунглях Південної Америки. Але Сему все рівно, де товкти пики інопланетним загарбникам, в єгипетських пірамідах чи пірамідах майя. По горам трупів своїх ворогів Сем йде до своєї мети. Окрім Південної Америки, ми також побуваємо у древньому Вавілоні та середньовічній Європі.

Гра має надзвичайно динамічний геймплей, величезну кількість зброї, пістолети, дробовики, автомат Томпсона, шестиствольний кулемет, є навіть середньовічна гармата, величезну кількість різновидів ворогів, такому різноманіттю та стилю можуть позаздрити навіть сучасні шутери. Як вам сподобаються одноокі, квадратні Гнари, з пащею на пів тіла, чи безголові камікадзе, які умудряються якимось чином кричати, поки біжать до вас, чи велетенські бики? Кожного монстра хочеться детально роздивитись перш ніж пустити на фарш. На відкритих, величезних локаціях на гравця кидають десятки, а то і сотні ворогів, і в кожного свої слабкі та сильні сторони, які треба враховувати. Для кожного монстра треба свій підхід, тактика і зброя. Хоча інтелектом вороги не виділяються, вони не використовують укриттів, не мають якоїсь тактики, а зазвичай беруть числом, та біжать лише в одному напрямку, напрямку гравця. Кожний бій особливий, напружений, дещо схожий до попередніх але при тому унікальний, в тому і вся фішка геймплея Serious Sam, безкінечна стрільба не набридає. Окрім геймлею гра може похизуватись чудовою атмосферою, ми блукаємо по реальних місцях древнього Єгипту, Південної Америки, Вавілону та Європі. На рівнях повно секретів, серед яких можуть бути як звичайні тайники зі зброєю, чи аптечками, так і не стандартні, як кімната з головатими розробниками, які дуже драматично помирають. Також в грі є різноманітні боси, які можуть бути як звичайними монстрами, просто великих розмірів, що займають цілий екран, так і оригінальні, з власними вміннями та тактикою.

В підсумку хочеться сказати, що якщо у вас ще нема Serious Sam Classic, то сміливо замість них беріть Serious Sam Revolution, тут ви знайдете все, що цінуєте в старих Семах та навіть більше, покращена графіка, воркшоп, онлайн, кооператив, ачівки, додаткові рівні, та багато іншого.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067021854', 'num_games_owned': 781, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1537695614}
review:
Serious Sam isn’t about a war, protecting the world, or defeating some evil threat -- it’s about you, the effects of your actions, and events that are out of your control. The sum of Serious Sam's unexpected story is a shooter that makes killing things mean something. This, along with its thoughtful aesthetic and intelligent enemy encounters, defies the standard established by low-aiming action games.

10/10

review:
Let's call this one the "Definitive Edition" of the Classics, both being fused into one experience while using Steamworks and the Workshop, just like the HD Encounters and BFE does.

Refine the netcode a little, give it a little bit of bugfixing here and there (still getting random crashes occasionally), add the remaining campaign to it and it's good to go.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995957283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 1301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1654428550}
review: A game worth playing if you like the classic Serious Sam titles or just want something new to play in the series. The graphics stick to being similar if not the same as the classic encounters. The gameplay is the same as the classics with some extra difficulty here and there. Also, a new map is added and two new guns are added(I think). It is not a fantasic revision but it is free if you own the classics already, so it is like a bonus. Also, you have the ability to play Serious Sam: The First Encounter and Serious Sam: The Second Encounter unabridged if you do not wish to switch between games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123412640', 'num_games_owned': 511, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 2431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2431, 'last_played': 1418867952}
review:
Serious Sam Classics: Revolution is a combination of Serious Sam: The First Encounter and Serious Sam: The Second Encounter. The combination of two classic first person shooters not only comes bundled with the two originals, but also with tons of extra features to make it have even more lastability. There are more guns, more modes, and even an extra campaign on the way. (This is an early access review so that hasn't been finished yet) There's also a workshop with lots of interesting custom made levels, full missions, custom scenarios, and tons of changed for textures, skins, and other visuals. There's so much content in this version, along with some controller support and other cool features to better suit newer and broader audiences, that it's practically overflowing!

Beyond all the amazing extra features with this new version, the combination of the two classics into one epic adventure is great. It will be many hours of gameplay shooting down tons of interesting enemies with cool guns in big arena styled combat. Maybe a few minor puzzle bits here and there. And of course, some very large environments to view and explore. 

You may not want to get the few changes and additions to the game that are in this version, though. And if not, well this is still an excellent way to get the first two encounters in their original form at the same time! A bit cheaper than the complete pack. You can play them without all the extra stuff added in.

Yet you'll still want Revolution for the workshop content, extra modes, extra campaign, new features, and online capability, though I haven't personally played online. I might in the future, but I'm not too into online stuff, so if anything I'll most likely wait for the full release when more people are buying and playing. Perhaps I'll update this once I've tried it to give you my thoughts on that as well.

So it sure sounds like I'm all for this, but note there are some issues here too. It's early access, so it will be changing still. I'm not sure what will be added, cut, or changed. So it's always risky. Also, the workshop content does seem to be annoying to manage, as you have to delete it from Steam for get rid of it, then boot up the game, have it make the changes, and the reboot it so the changes can be permenent. But it's not too hard to do. There's also the inherent problems with quality control on the workshop, which can compound that pain. Sometimes older items from the original games get put into the workshop but don't work because of the changes in this version, and that can be... frustrating to get in on before others catch it. There's the lack of the new campaign as of now, which... will most likely be coming but isn't really a plus to truly note until it does come. And the biggest thing is... why get this over the HD remakes? Well, it's cheaper, and has different physics... but other than that, it sounds rather comparabile. I don't know much about the HD ones, so I'm unsure if there is a workshop for those or not. This is a fan project that opens up more possibilities than the HD versions do, as far as I can tell. Also, this one actually runs on my computer, so... it's nice for that.

Basically, it comes down to the fact that if you like Serious Sam games, you'll probably love this with all the extended playing you'll get to do. You get this plus the two originals. Three games for the price of ten bucks for one. That's pretty good! And if you already have the originals on Steam... well what the heck are ya waitin' for!? This is FREE for those who already have those! There's no reason to NOT get it then. With all the awesomeness of the originals, the inclusion of them with this purchase, and the incredible amount of extra material even already in the early access version, Serious Sam Classics: Revolution gets an 8/10. Fans of the classic FPS... no need to look in your wallet, you know that 10 bucks is already gone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025467608', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1696538319}
review: This is amazing. It has the first encounter and the second encounter plus a few additional maps. The multiplayer is not on gamespy so you can actually play online without any need of doing tricks with gameranger and hamachi. There is content made by the community and most of the times its great content. Overall its a great game. The only difference between the original encounters and ''Revolution'' is that there are a few new weapons and a bit changed hud. There are no flaws that I have yet experienced and I've only seen good things! More video settings which means no more limit in playing only in 1024x768! I completely recommend buying this!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084630592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 19931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16053, 'last_played': 1582351712}
review:
This game is from fans. Serious Sam Revolution has the classics First Encounter and Second Encounter in combined in one game and Fans added survival first two maps and then added 2 more. I will not say anything about the First and Second Encounters same as it is in HD The First Encounter and Second Encounter or the classics without HD. so let's look at erros,bugs,problems. 
 
Errors,Bugs and Problems 
 
1.You can not vote in multiplayer so,if noobs join  on the server example in Team Deathmatch you have a bad luck. 
2. If someone invites you to a server or you invite him he clicks on the invitation so nothing happens. So you need to negotiate on name server ... 
3. Learboards 
-Firstly: You can not click on profiles.  
-Secondly: Learboards sees only what the names of anyone you put in the game. They do not see that the true name of Steam so noobs can easily hide under real names ... 
-Thirdly: Learboards do not see a hacked players in this direction, players have a free hand ... 
4. In server list have 5 of 6 server ping 29 and i connect to something  and i have ping 300-400 ... 
5. The Survival of the maps take ammo and others can not take and need to wait for 1 minute respawn but how we can play without ammo? The more players on the server mean the more powerful monsters! And you give one ammo for one minute and 1 player can take it hehe it is funny.
6. In Survival anyone can join during game and players can help to host or noobs can spoil the game by being run with monsters to host or will only run in the map and monsters will have a stronger hp of monster,if you have 2 players or more ... 
7. Every month, on average, has added a new achievement is very annoying for players who are 100%. And in that you saw the error cases that someone took the gold medal at the survival map Christmas 2014,but did not get achievement... 
8. This game does not have a moddable version and therefore in that game Workshop is not working as it should. Once you have a lot of  moddable maps your game can crash and when you want to start again and tells you that the game could not start a reason: lack of an executable file .... 
9. When you create a server for survival and 1-2 players join and all will have f3 game after 5 seconds game will crash! I can write what it wrote me in crash:The application has crashed. Whoops. We can probably fix that. We´ve generated 2 files a .mdmp(minidump) and a .rpt (report). The files should be located somewhere in your game directory in Steamapps. Please upload the .mdmp, .rpt.log files to our bugreporter, located at: http://ap.samrev.com/bugs/ 
10 Survival map faster faster! 
-Firstly: Short speedrun!
-Secondly: You can fall of the map! 
 
Liked  
 
1. In the leaderboards, you can watch how the players killing the enemies that record! It is Useful, can you see the Suspect players and can you report it to him admins he gets hack but first you need to fix what I wrote in The Beginning of Section 3.
2. During Survival Campaign or co-op games, you can see the damage you have put the enemies. But this is not reset in the next match in something that is good at something not. But if you can see that people are campers you would kick players who are campers, but you need fix section 1! 
3. Some Weapons was added,and it was not in last parts .
 
 I will not give any assessment because it is early access beta yet. I can say only one thing if you want more players in the future you have to fix at least 75% of the errors I wrote here. Certainly it would be to fix this 1,2,3,5,6,8. I wish good luck.

review: Serious Sam is a game that you definitely need to try out. This game can give you the most important thing that many modern games can't. It's satisfaction. After beating a hard level and kicking countless enemies' asses, you really feel that you accomplished something. All in all, I think that's what games are for. Considering that you get two full games with updated content for this price, calling it a bargain is not even close.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109691029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1663615159}
review:
「とにかく、撃ちまくって敵を倒す。シークレットを見つけてゲームを有利に進める」いわゆるオールドスクールなFPS。
目の前に現れた敵を撃ち殺す、近づいてきたら避ける、そして殺す。
しかし、敵どもはそう簡単に立ち回らせてくれない。物量でプレイヤーを殺しにくるのだ。
基本的に敵の大部分はこちらに突っ込んでくるだけで、サッと避けるようなことはしないが、それが束になって突っ込んでくるのだ。(多いときには数十体)
そしてプレイヤーは、ショットガンやロケランで吹き飛ばす。それがこのゲームの醍醐味。
アクション性が高めなので慣れない人、なかなか進めない人もいるだろうが、クイックセーブ機能があるので何か来ると思ったら即セーブできるのでリスタートも容易。(最初のうちはセーブを多用してステージを覚えていくことを推奨)

敵の種類も豊富で、ただ単に撃ってくるだけの首無しも居ればボムを投げるやつも居るし、こちらに突っ込んできて飛び掛ってくる厄介なガイコツ牛(こいつが大量に出てくる場所もあってキツイ)、マシンガンをもったサソリ、鳥人間などなど。
極めつけは、「kamikaze」。名前の通り爆弾を突っ込んでくるだけの敵ではあるが、こいつも大量に出てくるうえに捌き切れなかったら大ダメージで死に直結する。
そんな野郎どもをショットガンやロケランで粉砕するのだ。
　
また、この「Serious Sam」、シリアスという名前をつけておきながらこのゲームにはシリアス要素が全く無い。
主人公のサムは陽気なヤローで、上から降って来て転がってきた岩を見て「あのインディージョンズのテーマ」を口笛で鳴らしておちゃらけてしまう。
先ほど名を上げた「kamikaze」も、「Ahaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!!!!!!!!!」と叫びながら突っ込んでくるため非常にシュール。
はっきり言ってバカゲーである。頭をカラッポにして遊んでみるのも一興だろう。
　
ただ、古いFPSによくある「シークレットが見つけづらい」のもあったり、初見では武器の弾薬配分が分からないため、前半に使いすぎて後半が辛くなる点もある。
また、難易度が高くなるにつれてしっかり弾薬管理をしないと詰んでしまう。ただ単にトリガーハッピーではいけない面もあるので注意。

このSerious Sam Classics: RevolutionはThe First EncounterとThe Second Encounterのファンリメイクであり、グラフィック等の改良がなされている。(さすがにHD版には劣るが)
また、Steamワークショップに対応しておりMODも入れられる。
また、このRevolutionを買うとオリジナル版のThe First EncounterとThe Second Encounterもついてくるため、オリジナルの雰囲気も楽しめるのでオススメ。(オリジナル版はこの時代だと劣って見えるだろうが、当時数人しかいなかったチームで広大なMAPを作りあげたのは凄いと思う)
 
とにかく撃ちまくりたい人、対人戦に飽きを感じてきている人。このゲームで大量の敵どもを蹴散らし、Yeehaaaaaaaaa!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!と叫んでみるのはいかがだろうか。

author: {'steamid': '76561198061855628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2060, 'last_played': 1483642034}
review:
Игра очень хорошая, но присутсвуют баги.
1) В кооперативе можно "наносить" урон другим людям и так набивать "дамаг"
2) Не всегда видно скины других игроков (показывает стандартный)
3) Не всегда удаётся присоеденится к другому серверу
4) Есле у вас уже есть оружие (например ракетница) и вы не держите его в руках, подобрав такое же второй раз вы его теряете. (только в кооперативе)
5) Не работает секрет на уровне Siera de Chapas где в начале надо срубить 9 деревьев и появится пулимёт, патроны и 2 больших моба.

Извините есле пишу не туда куда нужно, с bugreport-ом тоже какие-то проблемы. (ну или я такой тупой :) )

Не смотря на эти баги 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025540438', 'num_games_owned': 7101, 'num_reviews': 558, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1568256249}
review:
It's the two Encounter games combined into one package, with some bug fixes and engine improvements, but without the shiny graphics or QoL changes the HD versions brought.

They're apparently adding a campaign with new content unique to this version at some point, but as we're still in EA that may be a ways off

It also has a workshop with different content from what's on HD/Fusion's workshop, so you'll be able to get some unique content out of that that isn't available for HD. 

It's cheaper than buying HD 1st/2nd Encounter, so if you want the same great games at a cheaper price, and don't mind the graphical cut, then you'll get plenty enjoyment out of this version.

Withholding a score until the new campaign is out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137314728', 'num_games_owned': 485, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1567616694}

author: {'steamid': '76561198050253742', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 3172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1670533753}
review:
Serious Sam Classics: Revolutions is a game that not only enables you to play both Serious Sam encounters in the same game window, it also adds support for widescreen monitors (which the standalone classics lacked), fixed a few bugs with mouse aiming, while also keeping the classic graphics so that even people with bad PCs (including myself) can play with these fixes.

I truly recommend this if you are having problems with the standalone episodes, and hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993713243', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1084, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1676621691}
review:
Serious Sam: Revolution - это переиздание The First Encounter и The Second Encounter, созданое фанатами в одной игре.
Графика таже, что и в оригинале, но оптимизировано под современные системы. 
Есть возможность сменить интерфейс игры на классический или тот, что был в Serious Sam Xbox/Serious Sam Next Encounter.
В игре есть несколько скрытых новых пушек, но увы надолго они у вас не задержаться (патронов на них не дают).
К сожалению в мультиплеере особо народу не видел, так что опробывать его не получилось.

Имеет смысл к покупке только фанатам серии или любителям старых мясных шутеров.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124166796', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1844, 'last_played': 1449370857}
review:
Well, I put 30 hours Into the game. So, might as well make a review for It finally! 


Serious Sam Classics: Revolution Is a game pack.  That reminds me an awful lot of Serious Sam for the Xbox. As It even had The First, and Second Encounters merged Into one big fantastic gore fest. 

Now I've been playing Serious Sam since The First Encounter way back, and I haven't stopped playing since then . Sadly I've been living a depressing life, and thanks to Sam he has been there for me, to ease the pain. I'll never regret how much how this game puts me in good spirits even if it's for just short bursts.

Anyways, back to this seriously awesome pack of seriousness. Which like I stated at the start of this review. The first two encounters are included, but now something new is invading the this seriously awesome world. Croteam are implementing a third campaign, which Is still not playable yet. Though since the game Is still In Early Access. Hopefully soon It'll be included. Now I have encountered some bugs and problems with It, but hopefully It'll take notice and Croteam It will get fixed real soon. 

Anyways, let's talk about the games contents... shall we?


==[Serious Sam - The First Encounter] ==


So, the game actually doesn't start with much of a story, If you didn't skip the opening credits that Is. The game takes place In Egypt, 3000 B.C. (As Serious Sam states In Serious Sam 3: BFE, a prequel to SS:TFE).

At the start of the game, before the bloodbath really sets in. You get to meet your little AI friend "Netrica". (Or her nickname Nettle, In Serious Sam 2) Though In this review, we'll be calling her Nettie for now. Hehe,She's a AI computer planted Into Sam's brain, and she's Sam's friend, and your guide throughout the experience. Nettle will give you useful tips on things such as the history on the area you're In, Information on the aliens you'll be encountering, etc. She's quite useful, and I recommend reading what she says when you click on your right mouse button. 

So, some may say. The point of the game Is just shoot, go to the next arena, and shoot more again. Or kill anything that moves. Nope, It's not only that, but the open areas are beautiful and wide. And there's many secrets to discover In each one If your curious enough to take a treasure hunt. Now for the AI on the monsters, the AI Is just ment to be stupid, really. As the monsters are just pretty mindless, so what's the point of having good AI? Now for the graphics. The graphics were beautiful and fantastic back In 2001. The reflections and many effects the game Is just beautiful. The Serious Engine Is perfectly made, and It was a marvel for It's time."

__________________________


==[Serious Sam - The Second Encounter]==


Alright! Now to move onto Serious Sam: The Second Encounter.


Now, this one Is the cartoons variation of the Serious Sam games. Though that's what I kind of love about the games, the cartoon like vibe and humor! But seriously... Who doesn't?
So, at the ending of Serious Sam: The First Encounter. The Croteam Developers make a rather funny appearance In the opening Intro. Flying flying In rollercoaster like snake of crates, and they accidently smash Into the Sirian UFO that Sam Is In. Sam Is a little enraged by this, and the UFO crashes Into the mountains of South America. Sam thought he'd be In Egypt again, but he was wrong.

Now, as you might now know.  the Serious Sam games have always been known for the Egypt setting. Which I'm pretty sure a lot of gamers got sick of. This was a chance for Croteam to do something else other blast away aliens near towering pyramids. This time however you get some new toys to add to Sams collection. A Sniper Rifle, Flamethrower and Chainsaw. Now, you get to mutilate the invasion with even more "class". Such as the Demons, chainsaw wielding pumpkin heads, and many other deranged baddies. Which just makes the game even more Awesome! Plus your little friend Netrica Is back! And ready to give you more Info!

__________________________


The developers of Serious Sam Classics: Revolution are doing a great job on this! They may need to still work on some bugs, but Croteam is doing a great job altogether though!

And well, that's the end of this review. I wanna thank Croteam for creating this beautifully articulated and well crafted game. Also for this game helping me through the rough times in my life. 


I my yellow shades towards you Croteam. For making me the guy I am today . The fact they care even for their work in the past. As this pack makes the originals live long and unformatted. Again, Thank you Croteam, and I hope you'll be making Serious Sam games 'till the day you croak.


Credit goes to ZealousFoX for helping me Improve the review more, and being a great friend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073559027', 'num_games_owned': 701, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 811, 'last_played': 1597251284}
review:
Убойный комплект из двух оригинальных Сэмов адаптированный под современные ПК фанаты как и я в восторге.
Купил в первый же день релиза поначалу думал что зря (играть было не возможно из-за технического состояния), впрочем люди оказались не из ленивых и за недельку всё докрутили.
Когда я наконец смог нормально поиграть то осознал что HD переиздания (тех же игр) полная фигня по сравнению с оригиналом. Единственное что меня немного расстроило только то что не добавили классической русской озвучки (когда главный герой разговаривает голосом Джигурды это заряжает позитивом).
Ещё огромный плюс оригинальных Сэмов это очень забавные секретны.На пример в The Second Encounter (не помню на каком уровне) есть секретная комната в которой находится уменьшенная локация с финальной битвой из The First Encounter неожиданно включается саундтрек (с той же битвы) .а так же выстрелы. мне стало интересно и я попытался найти там Сэма и нашёл. После я захотел в него стрельнуть (лучше бы я этого не дела после того как я всадил в него дробью он откинулся и вместе с ним я главное что я забыл сохранится и меня кинуло в начало уровня). И таких забавных тайников ещё много. 
Ещё в игре крутой дизайн монстров к примеру безголовый камикадзе (люди до сих пор гадают чем они кричат(я склоняюсь к версии с играющим плееров в штанах)). Ещё гнаары у которых самки больше и сильней самцов (даже как-то жалко самцов).    

Итог удачное переиздание классического Сэма. Моя оценка чистая 10 "Игра исключительно для фанатов не знаю почему современный народ Сэма недолюбливает".        

Респект разработчикам за адекватную цену всего 149 руб. (Уже не актуально) . Любые другие издатели брали бы за неё в 1,5-2 раза больше.

review: Куда лучше переиздания SS: HD, а уж работа мультиплеера даже после смерти gamespy'евских серверов - это вообще вишенка на большой торт под названием "Серьезный Сэм". Игра хороша в своем угаре отстрела орд противников чертовой ручной мортирой даже сейчас, когда я уже наизусть помню добрую половину секретов и сколько врагов ждет меня за углом.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081241394', 'num_games_owned': 441, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 839, 'last_played': 1685969357}
review:
Ах божа ... дзякуй вам велізарнае за гэтую ігру ... мала таго, разам з гэтай Serious Sam Classics: Револютион ішлі дзве класічныя версіі першай і другой часткі. Столькі ўспамінаў адгукнуліся ў сэрцы, што можна пусціць слязу ... 
Гэта версія фанатаў класічны сэмов, чые імёны павінны назаўсёды застацца ў пантэоне. Акрамя таго, Сэм падтрымлівае майстэрню, таму можна тварыць тое, што вы хочаце. Дададзена пару новых гармат і рэжым выжывання, а так жа выпраўлена шмат багаў. А гэтым часам разработчыкі працуюць над новай кампаніяй, у якую, спадзяюся мы пагуляем зусім хутка. Варта выдаткаваць на гэтую ігру свае грошы ... а я ж набыў яе фактычна за дарам, па зніжцы. Дзякуй за ўвагу.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965381305', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1650154461}
review:
Serious Sam Revolution the best way to enjoy the classic (and in my opinion best) Serious Sam games.

This version works right out of the box with modern PCs (incl. widescreen resolution etc.) and is alot easier to tweak on Windows 7 & 8 then the older releases.

Everything you expect from this rerelease already works flawlessly (at least on my computer). That includes multiplayer, through internet or splitscreen and playing through the classic campaigns (you can even play through them back to back as if they were one game)

Honestly - I don't know why this is still early access. I've encountered not a single bug or flaw.

Wether you are a new player and want to experience this great game from yesteryear for the first time or a veteran who wants another playthrough - look no further than Serious Sam Revolution!

review:
Шутеры в наше время сводятся к какой-то казуальщине, просто беги от укрытия к укрытию и стреляй... Не уверен то, что это весело. И игр такого жанра со старой геймплейной частью я не встречал, разве только серия CS. Вот почему моё отношение к этой игре, как м моей порно коллекции :)

ПЛЮСЫ
Геймплей
Юмор (Своеобразный, но всё-же юмор)
Графика (Если сравнивать с оригиналом)

МИНУСЫ
Они есть, но настолько мелкие, что даже говорить нет смысла (В основном это проблемы движка)

"Что у нас с мультиплеером?"- Он есть, некоторые в него играют... Описать его вам не смогу, так-как хрен его настроишь :С

Спасибо за время, потраченное вами за просмотром моего обзора :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031435144', 'num_games_owned': 1797, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1480002510}
review:
Have you ever moved so fast and had so much going on that you couldn't even see what was going on? This fenomenom is called Motion-Induced Blindness and Serious Sam is a good example of it. 

If I were to boil down what this game is about it would probably sound something along the lines of:

[...] PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW

NEW WEAPON!

BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM [...]

Has co-op. 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064202887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1413468256}
review:
Hrali ste už hru Serious sam ? 
Ak nie tak momentálna akcia by pre vás mala byť znamením, táto hra vás nauči ako reagovať na rôzne druhy nepriateľov a že strieľať a hýbať sa zároveň je jediná možnosť ako prežiť medzi veľkou kopou rôznych príšer od výmyslu sveta

Ja osobne som túto hru hral už ako malý a veľmi ma tešilo grafické spracovanie
K tejto verzii si pripočítajte workshop a achievementy a dostávate skvelý zážitok

Rozhodne odporúčam

author: {'steamid': '76561198127122137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1434458618}
review:
Difficoltà: 8/10 Non sono riuscito a finire la campagna.ho dovuto fare una Co-Op per poter finire il gioco (Ci abbiamo messo 40 minuti solo per l'ultimo livello)
Divertimento: 9/10 Ho trovato molto divertente la campagna,soprattutto in Co-Op
Grafica (per quei tempi): 8/10 Essendo un gioco per pc si può anche accettare.
Sonoro: 8/10 Per colpa dei kamikaze che con le loro urla mi fanno venire il mal di testa
SinglePlayer: 9+/10 La trama di Serious Sam può anche sembrare no-sense,ma assomiglia un pò ai film di avventura,e le missioni sono anche difficili (Si collega tutto al discorso dulla difficoltà),i templi da esplorare mentre uccidi tutti i mostri presenti nel gioco
Multiplayer: 1/10 Non c'è il multiplayer su questo gioco,ma in compenso c'è la Co-Op
Media dei voti:7+/10
Somma dei voti: 43/60
Conclusione: Consiglio questo gioco (ma anche tutti i SS in generale) a tutti i fan dell'avventura e degli FPS/TPS

author: {'steamid': '76561198044910614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 59260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1308, 'last_played': 1707600731}
review:
Serious Sam is the best first-person shooter to ever grace this planet. Why?

Unlike Doom, there's no stupid complicated mazes.

Unlike Duke Nukem 3D, there's no goddamn keycard hunts.

Unlike Quake, there's more colors than brown, black, and gray.

Unlike Unreal, there's no dumb enemy placements.

Unlike Half-Life, there's great music playing all the time.

Unlike System Shock 2, there's no needlessly complex interface.

Unlike Call of Duty, your guns are all unique.

Unlike Battlefield, there's no dumb realism that slows the game down.


If you think those qualities above makes a game great, you're wrong. Check out what Serious Sam has to offer:

-Fast-paced action to keep you on the edge of your seat.
-Huge, beautiful environments for you to immerse in.
-Loads and loads of enemies for you to take on at the same time.
-Simple yet smart level layouts that makes the best of enemies, items, weapons, secrets, and traps.
-Dynamic and wonderfully-composed music that changes based on the level of action you're facing.
-Different types of enemies to provide maximum challenge.
-Fun, unique weapons that has a purpose in any given situation.
-All you need to know is how to move and shoot to play the game.

Combine all that, and you just got yourself the recipe for the perfect game. Serious Sam Revolution is a compilation of the classic Serious Sam 1 games, The First Encounter and The Second Encounter. TFE contains 15 levels while TSE contains 12, all of them fun, massive, and action-packed.


"But isn't there already Serious Sam HD, where it is the same game with nice modern graphics?"

First of all, slap yourself for saying that. Now listen to what I have to say.

Graphics doesn't make a game good. It's how you implement it with the other aspects of the game. Fortunately for Serious Sam Revolution, its 2001 and 2002 graphics still hold up well by today's standards. The way they used the bright colors is what makes it different from HD; in some way it even looks better than HD despite being not as detailed. This is because it is specifically designed to be eye-catching instead of just having higher polygons and resolution.

Serious Sam HD also lost other cool aspects of Serious Sam Classics, such as special gravity and enemy combos. These may seem like minor changes, but it's the little things that counts.


With all that said, if you still consider Serious Sam Revolution not worth of purchase, perhaps it's time for you to reflect on yourself and your life so far to find out how you reached the conclusion that you shouldn't play this masterpiece of a game. Then buy the game and play it so that you'll realize the errors of your ways, correct yourself, and become a better person though Serious Sam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061795751', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1417029868}
review:
Classic serious sam with all it's glory+ more new stuff.It's and exciting project which is aimed to enhance the classic experience,and support it with new modes and such.As it's in a early access stage,the game is not yet complete which raises negative opinions and comments about it,naturally.But to be honest,releasing a stand alone title by some developers and contributors is not the real solution for the decreasing popularity of the game.This should have been OFFICALLY SUPPORTED/APPLIED AUTOMATICALLY to SS:TSE/TFE by the Croteam to make it more accesible.By doing that they will allow the Revolution to be supported continueously and effectively.I highly doubt this game will be popular as Classics were back in the day,but I whole heartedly hope it to be so.

TL:DR:The game you'll love as you did Classics,but is not enough to be released as a stand alone game. Give it a try if you have the money/will to.
